statements: DELETE FROM drivers WHERE driver_id = 1 AND delivery_count > 10;
DELETE FROM drivers WHERE distance_covered > 1000 AND end_location = 'Warehouse';
DELETE FROM delivery_history WHERE driver_id = 101 AND delivery_status = 'delivered';

DELETE FROM drivers WHERE driver_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM delivery_history WHERE delivery_id = 10 AND driver_id = 3;
